archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.4.7b: b) determines the motivation, capabilities and commitment of identified threats and the extent to which the organisation is at risk of a targeted attack (e.g. by reviewing discovered code on the internet, obtaining alerts provided by a CERT and examining discussions in underground groups)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
